Text:
Classification: Scripted
Genre: Family | Lifestyle
Status: New Series
Network: BBC One ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Fridays at 08:30 pm
Runtime: 90 Minutes
Premiere: March 01, 2013

Mary And Martha is written by Richard Curtis and stars Hilary Swank as Mary and Brenda Blethyn as Martha, an American and an Englishwoman who have nothing in common apart from a tragedy that brings them together.


(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-34536)
